poisson colours

Source: R/colours.R
pois_cols.Rd

poisson colours

pois_cols(cols = NULL)

Arguments

cols

Character names of Poisson colours

Value

a named vector of hex colours

Examples

pois_cols()
#>             black              aqua               red            yellow 
#>         "#000000"         "#00706C"         "#E84D22"         "#F7B500" 
#>            purple             green              blue            orchid 
#>         "#821C65"         "#63BB42"         "#90BDE5"         "#D888CF" 
#>              grey        legacy_red       legacy_blue      legacy_green 
#>         "#7D7D7D"         "#ff2500"         "#0433ff"         "#008b00" 
#>      legacy_brown       legacy_gray     legacy_orchid  legacy_lightblue 
#>         "#a52a2a"         "#707f90"         "#da70d6"         "#87cefa" 
#> legacy_aquamarine     legacy_orange     legacy_purple     cblind_orange 
#>         "#458b74"         "#cd8500"         "#a034f0"         "#D55E00" 
#>       cblind_blue      cblind_green      cblind_mango     cblind_yellow 
#>         "#0072B2"         "#009E73"         "#E69F00"         "#F0E442" 
#>       cblind_pink  cblind_lightblue        pois_blue1        pois_blue2 
#>         "#CC79A7"         "#56B4E9"         "#759dbe"         "#92bde3" 
#>        pois_blue3 
#>         "#abcbe7"
